europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 33. The type of Cyornis unicolor harterti Robinson & Kinnear, 1928, and associated nomenclatural issues
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Dickinson E.C.
Dekker R.W.R.J.
Walters M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Cyornis unicolor harterti
Rhinomyias umbratilis
Rhinomyias olivacea
nomen novum
type locality
lectotype selection
europeana:record.dc:description: The complex history of the nomenclature of the Malayan and Greater Sundan population of Cyornis unicolor is discussed and corrections to type localities relating to two names are provided. The whereabouts of critical type material is revealed and a lectotype is designated. Information given by Watson et al. (1986) is thus amended.
europeana:record.dcterms:alternative: 2 colour pl. on p. 218-219 Corrigenda published in ZV 250 (2004, p. 203, and in: Zoologische Mededelingen 80-5 (2006) p. 317
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 33. The type of Cyornis unicolor harterti Robinson & Kinnear, 1928, and associated nomenclatural issues (Volume 340)
